name: Untitled Tank Duel Game
description:
# Local multiplayer.

# 2 players on same device.

# No internet connection required.

# More tanks and levels coming soon.

# More device supports coming soon.

Player 1 Controls

forward = up

backward = down

turn left = left

turn right = right

turret left = num 4

turret right = num 6

shoot = shift

Player 2 controls

forward = up

backward = down

turn left = left

turn right = right

turret left = n

turret right = m

shoot = ctrl
